BBEX3.A.NOK.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Norway / EUR 1 = NOK ... (buying)
Source: Since December 2003 DNB, Oslo (formerly: DnB NOR) 1999 - November 2003 Den norske Bank, Oslo
Methodology: Since 2012, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, previously on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.
